page.title: 18BANKS IN CHINGFORD
page.content:
In Station Rd,North Chingford there are 11 banks and building societies and one post office.Some of these have a cash dispenser. We did a survey among some children to find out where they had saved their money,in which account.
Here is the result;- Abbey National{ 14 }Barclays{11 National Westminster {7 }Woolwich {3 Post Office {6 }Midland { 3 Halifax{ 2 } T.S.B. { 1 Lloyds { 1 } Leicester{0 Bradford and Bingley {0 { It would seem that the Abbey National is particulary good at attracting children.
